The Facebook post includes a purported c: General Certificate of Exemption” that appears to be issued under the “Aborigines Protection Act 1909-1943, Section 18c”.
The certificate includes three special c: Speaking in native language - Prohibited", "Engaging in Dance, rituals native customs - Prohibited", and "Associating with fellow indigenous people (including family) - Prohibited".
The image is not a genuine: Certificate of Exemption" and is misleading.
The SBS advertisement for First Australi: which depicted a certificate of exemption, did not contain an original document and the content was based on information provided by the producers of the documentary series.
